name: You're dad, man!
description:
YOU'RE DAD, MAN!

Typical dad forced to become a hitman. Killing and telling dad jokes.

You have to do quests about killing people. Pay attention to content of your missions! Do you really know  who you have to kill?

Controlers: only mouse

Team:

Marek Ozimina, Marcin Bugala, Wioletta Orlowska, Pawel Szpiczakowski, Elie Abraham
